body:
Okay, so I don't really know if anyone has done a topic like this yet, so sorry if I've "copied" you but, who cares, its just a bit of fun.

Below, copy and paste the list of favourites into the comments and fill in all your favourites!

Favourite Food:

Favourite Musician/Band/Singer:

Favourite Movie:

Favourite Song:

Favourite School Subject:

Favourite YouTuber:

Favourite Animal:

Favourite Sport:

Favourite Avicus Game:

So after a while, just to "spice" things up a bit, ill tally/count up all the answers and edit in what favourite appeared the most in one 'official' list. (If that makes sense)

Ill start:

Favourite Food: Pizza!

Favourite Musician/Band/Singer: Eminem

Favourite Movie: Shawshank Redemption

Favourite Song: Currently it's Rock Bottom, By Eminem

Favourite School Subject: English

Favourite YouTuber: Me. Jks, probably RayWilliamJohnson

Favourite Animal: Hawk

Favourite Sport: Cricket

Favourite Avicus Game: NEBULA!

Your Turn!
